== Arambol (CT) (626658) ==

Arambol (CT) is a town in the [[PERNEM]] taluka of [[NORTH GOA]] district with an area of 9.66 sq. km. and harbouring 1234 households with total population of 5322 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[PANAJI]] is at a distance of 40 km. The state headquarter [[PANAJI]] is at a distance of 40 km. Male population is 2780 and female population is 2542. Scheduled Caste population is 125 and Scheduled Tribes population is 0. Census Location Code of the town is 626658<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class V (population_total 5,000 to 9,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is BELGAUM at a distance of 161 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is PUNE at a distance of 463 km. Railway station is at PERNEM at a distance of 16 km.

== Sanitation and Drinking Water ==  
The town has open drainage system.
Water is supplied from a service reservoir. The town gets it water as tap water from a treated source. The capacity of the water supply system is 650 kilo-litres.

The nearest fire fighting service is at PERNEM (13 km) .
